analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/24/0xdb2e1d83f24950aa97cff4eb68af24d92b4e584b.sol#530-545) is declared view but contains assembly code

	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/24/0xdb2e1d83f24950aa97cff4eb68af24d92b4e584b.sol#498-499)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/24/0xdb2e1d83f24950aa97cff4eb68af24d92b4e584b.sol#520-530) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/24/0xdb2e1d83f24950aa97cff4eb68af24d92b4e584b.sol#523-530)
